snippet: A Hungarian court sent four neo-Nazis to prison on Tuesday for killing Roma families in a spree of racist violence in 2008 and 2009.
abstract: Hungarian court sends four neo-Nazis to prison for killing Roma families in spree of racist violence in 2008 and 2009 that shocked country and led to accusations that police failed to protect the historically persecuted minority.
lead_paragraph: A Hungarian court sent four neo-Nazis to prison on Tuesday for killing Roma families in a spree of racist violence in 2008 and 2009.

headline.main: Hungary: 4 Men Sentenced in Neo-Nazi Killing Spree
headline.print_headline: Hungary: 4 Men Sentenced in Neo-Nazi Killing Spree
